message.name: Null
message.description: This level indicates that the person should not consume products from this category under any circumstances due to their nutritional restriction.

message.name: Very Low
message.description: Extremely limited consumption; almost never consumed. Only occasionally and in very small amounts.

message.name: Low
message.description: Reduced consumption; can be consumed occasionally but always in small quantities and with caution.

message.name: Moderate
message.description: Moderate consumption; allowed with some frequency, but not recommended in large quantities.

message.name: High
message.description: Regular consumption; can be consumed often and in typical amounts without significant issues.

message.name: Very High
message.description: Free consumption; the person can consume products from this category without any restriction.
